title: Jacob Mathew’s Blog
text:
Hi, I’m Jacob Mathew — a data scientist and engineer who loves probability puzzles, self-driving systems, and clean code.
This blog is where I share technical breakdowns of interesting problems, insights from simulations, and lessons from applying statistics in the real world.
Connect with me on GitHub or reach out on LinkedIn.

title: Welcome To My Blog
text:
This is the first post in a Quarto blog. Welcome!

Since this post doesn’t specify an explicit image, the first image in the post will be used in the listing page of posts.
